title: RCPITC Website
overview: My dream of sharing my skills is taking shape through my role as a founder at RCPITC (Rajshahi Cantonment Public IT Club). I'm thrilled to be part of creating a space where knowledge and passion for technology can thrive!  To kick things off, I designed the club's website using Next.js. My priority was to make a truly eye-catching design that grabs attention and sets the tone for the club's focus on innovation.
content: Building this website is more than just a project â€“ it's a step towards fulfilling my dream of mentoring and inspiring others in the world of technology.  The visually stunning website is a testament to the club's commitment to excellence and is sure to inspire new members to dive into the exciting world of tech. I'm immensely proud to be part of making this dream a reality!
